idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
#13 total in loop of 208 beats
for i in range(5):
    playNote(53, beats = 4)
    playNote(52, beats = 4)
    playNote(53, beats = 4)
    playNote(57, beats = 4)

#increase gain at 84 beats
playNote(53, beats = 4)
with gain(1.75):
    playNote(52, beats = 4)
    playNote(53, beats = 4)
    playNote(57, beats = 4)


#decrease gain after a few notes so that the composition isn't too loud:
for i in range(7):
    with gain(0.75):
        playNote(53, beats = 4)
        playNote(52, beats = 4)
        playNote(53, beats = 4)
        playNote(57, beats = 4) 
        
               
            
#second set of backing keys
moveTo(0)
#26 loops worth total for 208
for i in range(10):
    playNote(53, beats = 1)
    playNote(50, beats = 1)
    playNote(48, beats = 2)
    rest(beats = 1)
    playNote(55, beats = 2)
    playNote(60, beats = 1)

#Increase gain at beat 84
playNote(53, beats = 1)
playNote(50, beats = 1)
with gain(value = [ 1, 1.75 ], beats = 2):
    playNote(48, beats = 2)
with gain(1.75):
    rest(beats = 1)
    playNote(55, beats = 2)
    playNote(60, beats = 1)

#Maintain gain for remainder    
for i in range(15):
    with gain(0.75):
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(50, beats = 1)
        playNote(48, beats = 2)
        rest(beats = 1)
        playNote(55, beats = 2)
        playNote(60, beats = 1)

        
        
#chords starting from the beginning
moveTo(0)
from tunepad.chords import *
#26 total in loop
for i in range(4):
    playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)
    playChord("vi", beats=1, velocity=45)
    playChord("ii", beats=1, velocity=45)
    playChord("IV", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
    playChord("iii", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
    playChord("V", beats=1, velocity=45)
    playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)

rest(beats = 40)    
playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("vi", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("ii", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("IV", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
playChord("iii", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
playChord("V", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)

#increase gain at 84 beats
playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("vi", beats=1, velocity=45)
playChord("ii", beats=1, velocity=45)
with gain(value = [ 1, 1.75 ], beats = 1):
    playChord("IV", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
    playChord("iii", beats=1.5, velocity=45)
    playChord("V", beats=1, velocity=45)
    playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=45)

#maintain higher gain for remainder
for i in range(15):
    playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=50)
    playChord("vi", beats=1, velocity=50)
    playChord("ii", beats=1, velocity=50)
    playChord("IV", beats=1.5, velocity=50)
    playChord("iii", beats=1.5, velocity=50)
    playChord("V", beats=1, velocity=50)
    playChord("IV", beats=1, velocity=50)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
rest(beats = 92)

#introduce new melody loops
for i in range(2):
    with gain(1.5):
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(55, beats = 1)
        playNote(57, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(52, beats = 1)
        playNote(52, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        
rest(beats = 0.5)
for i in range(3): 
    playNote(53, beats = 1.5)
    playNote([45, 60], beats = 2)
    playNote(62, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(58, beats = 1.5)
    rest(beats = 2.5)
rest(beats = 8)
for i in range(3): 
    playNote(53, beats = 1.5)
    playNote([45, 60], beats = 2)
    playNote(62, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(58, beats = 1.5)
    rest(beats = 2.5)

#move to beat 110 for more dynamic sound
moveTo(110)
for i in range(10):
    with gain(1.5):
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(55, beats = 1)
        playNote(57, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)
        playNote(52, beats = 1)
        playNote(52, beats = 1)
        playNote(53, beats = 1)

#outro         
playNote(53, beats = 3)
playNote(52, beats = 3)
playNote(52, beats = 3)
playNote(53, beats = 3)
playNote(52, beats = 3)
playNote(53, beats = 3)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
rest(beats = 70)

#increase gain at beat 84
with gain(1.5):
    for i in range(16):
        playNote(48, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(47, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(50, beats = 0.5)
        rest(beats = 0.5)
        playNote(47, beats = 1)
        playNote(52, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(50, beats = 1)
        playNote(47, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(48, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(52, beats = 1)
        playNote(50, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(55, beats = 1)
#rest for remainder of composition
rest(beats = 10)

#Add new melody from beat 94
#16 beats in loop
moveTo(94)
for i in range(7):
    playNote(43, beats = 3.5)
    playNote(45, beats = 3)
    playNote(45, beats = 3.5)
    playNote(42, beats = 3)
    playNote(43, beats = 3)
    
playNote(50, beats = 2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
rest(beats = 92)

#introduce melody from beat 92
with gain(0.75):
    for i in range(2): 
        playNote(72, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(76, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(67, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(81, beats = 1)
        rest(beats = 1.5)
        playNote(74, beats = 1)
        playNote(77, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(76, beats = 1)
        playNote(69, beats = 1)
        playNote(67, beats = 0.5)

#16 beats of longer chords
playNote([69, 74], beats = 3)
playNote([77, 67], beats = 3)
playNote([69, 76], beats = 4)
playNote([81, 76], beats = 3)
playNote([67, 72], beats = 3)

#loop melody
for i in range(6):
    playNote(72, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(76, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(67, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(81, beats = 1)
    rest(beats = 1.5)
    playNote(74, beats = 1)
    playNote(77, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(76, beats = 1)
    playNote(69, beats = 1)
    playNote(67, beats = 0.5)
    
rest(beats = 4)

#play multiple notes at same time
playNote([69, 74], beats = 3)
playNote([77, 67], beats = 3)
playNote([69, 76], beats = 4)
playNote([81, 76], beats = 3)
playNote([67, 72], beats = 3)

rest(beats = 16)

#include longer notes behind the melody
moveTo(124)
for i in range(3):
    playNote(69, beats = 4)
    playNote(77, beats = 4)
    playNote(69, beats = 2.5)
    rest(beats = 1.5)
    playNote(81, beats = 2.5)
    playNote(67, beats = 1.5)
    
rest(beats = 20) 

#outro
playNote(77, beats = 6)
playNote(74, beats = 6)
playNote(67, beats = 4)
